text: James Farentino (February 24, 1938 - January 24, 2012) was an American movie, voice, stage, and television actor. He was known for his role in The Final Countdown, Jesus of Nazareth, and in Dynasty. He was born in Brooklyn, New York on February 24, 1938. He was married to Elizabeth Ashley from 1962 until they divorced in 1965. He was married to Michele Lee from 1966 until they divorced in 1982. He was married to Debrah Farentino from 1985 until they divorced in 1989. He was married to Stella Farentino from 1994 until his death in 2012. He had a son, David Farentino. Farentino died on January 24, 2012 from heart failure in Los Angeles, California, he was 73 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1938 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors
title: James Farentino
